sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from "react"; import productContext from "../../Context/ProductContext"; import "./ProductsSection.css"; export default function ProductsSection({ title, infos }) { const contextData= useContext(productContext) return ( <>

{title}

{infos.map((product) => (

{product.title}

{product.price}$


Add To Cart More Information

Number: {product.count}

))}
); }
